description:
Not every bike ride is encounter-free, so worry less and ride more with the Bike Direct Mount Bear Spray Holder. It lets you attach a cannister of Bear spray securely your bike frame to boost your confidence and protection on every ride.

  • Carbon-filled nylon makes a durable and light holder for your protection
  • Impact-resistant body to make sure it won’t smash when you crash
  • Included anti-scratch pads and bolts attach to bottle cage mounts keeping the spray in place
  • Fits standard 225g cannisters
  • Designed and made in Fernie, BC
name: Ghostrider Equipment Bike Direct Mount Spray Holder
